nodes.comandosqlorigendash21_00: SELECT 1 as id_record, 2 as Numsecuecial_grupoddatos,3 as Numsecuecial,nombrecolumna,cuando as Created_at,total as Valorcolumna,total as Valoramount  from (SELECT created_at at time zone 'utc' at time zone 'america/mexico_city' as cuando,nombrecolumna,sum(Valoramount) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr in( '%s') and created_At > (NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hours' )   and  nombrecolumna in (                select nombretop  from ( SELECT nombrecolumna as nombreTop,cast(sum(Valoramount) as money)  as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr in('31')  and created_At >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1' month) and created_At < date_trunc('month', current_date)   group by  nombrecolumna order by total desc limit 10) tablaTop10PreviousMonth           )  group by created_at, nombrecolumna order by total desc) as buen;
nodes.comandosqlorigendash21_01: SELECT 1 as id_record, 2 as Numsecuecial_grupoddatos,3 as Numsecuecial,nombrecolumna,cuando as Created_at,total as Valorcolumna,total as Valoramount  from (SELECT created_at at time zone 'utc' at time zone 'america/mexico_city'  as cuando,nombrecolumna,sum(Valoramount) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr in ( '%s' ) and created_At > (NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours' )  and created_At <= (NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hours' )   and  nombrecolumna in (               select nombretop  from ( SELECT nombrecolumna as nombreTop,cast(sum(Valoramount) as money)  as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr in('31')  and created_At >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1' month) and created_At < date_trunc('month', current_date)   group by  nombrecolumna order by total desc limit 10) tablaTop10PreviousMonth            )  group by created_at, nombrecolumna order by total desc) as buen;

nodes.comandosqlorigendash23_00: SELECT 1 as id_record, 2 as Numsecuecial_grupoddatos,3 as Numsecuecial,nombrecolumna,date(timezone('UTC-05', now()::timestamp)) as Created_at,total as Valorcolumna,total as Valoramount  from (SELECT nombrecolumna,sum(Valoramount) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr in( '%s') and created_At > date_trunc('day', now())  and  nombrecolumna in (         select nombretop  from ( SELECT nombrecolumna as nombreTop,cast(sum(Valoramount) as money)  as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr in('31')  and created_At >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1' month) and created_At < date_trunc('month', current_date)   group by  nombrecolumna order by total desc limit 10) tablaTop10PreviousMonth        )  group by  nombrecolumna order by total desc) as buen;
nodes.comandosqlorigendash23_70: SELECT 1 as id_record, 2 as Numsecuecial_grupoddatos,3 as Numsecuecial,nombrecolumna,current_date as Created_at,total as Valorcolumna,total as Valoramount  from (SELECT nombrecolumna,sum(Valoramount) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr in('%s') and created_At > date_trunc('day', now() - INTERVAL '8 DAY') and created_At <= date_trunc('day', now() - INTERVAL '7 DAY')  and  nombrecolumna in (      select nombretop  from ( SELECT nombrecolumna as nombreTop,cast(sum(Valoramount) as money)  as total  FROM banwiredash02graph02  WHERE  graphnbr in('31')  and created_At >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1' month) and created_At < date_trunc('month', current_date)   group by  nombrecolumna order by total desc limit 10) tablaTop10PreviousMonth       )  group by  nombrecolumna order by total desc) as buen;
